text.div:
SHR DrugIngredientVS ValueSet

Drug allergies involve ingredients or mixtures, not specific dose forms. The value set focuses on drug ingredients.

name: SHR DrugIngredientVS ValueSet
title: SHR DrugIngredientVS ValueSet
publisher: The MITRE Corporation: Standard Health Record Collaborative
description: Drug allergies involve ingredients or mixtures, not specific dose forms. The value set focuses on drug ingredients.
